MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW8 postcode areas of Sandiway and Cuddington, affecting properties in Weaverham Road, Rosslyn Lane and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30am due to faulty overhead equipment . Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.41am on 29th of April 2021.
